pageTitle: Gay Test | Am I Gay? Quiz for Self-Discovery
pageDescription: ðŸŒˆ Understanding your identity starts with awareness. The "Am I Gay Quiz" is a safe first step â€” no pressure, just reflection.
exploreKey: Explore key sections to navigate your identity journey:
aboutDescription: This confidential 16-question assessment helps you explore your sexual orientation. Based on psychological principles, it provides a framework for reflecting on same-sex attraction.
privacyDescription: Your answers stay completely private. We don't store any personal data or quiz responses.
selfDiscoveryDescription: Use this quiz as a starting point for personal reflection, not as a definitive label.
spectrumDescription: Understand that sexuality exists on a spectrum and may be fluid throughout your life.
quizDuration: Free, anonymous, and takes about 5 minutes
scoreExplanation: Your score indicates where you fall on the sexual orientation spectrum:
mixedRange: 13-24 points: Mostly heterosexual with some same-sex attraction
rememberText: This quiz is just a starting point for self-reflection. Sexual orientation exists on a spectrum, and many people's attractions can be fluid over time. There's no right or wrong result, and only you can truly define your identity.
resourcesDescription: If you're looking for support or more information about sexual orientation and identity, these organizations can help:
trevorDescription: Crisis intervention and suicide prevention for LGBTQ young people.
pflagDescription: Support for LGBTQ+ people, their families, and allies.
glaadDescription: Resources and education about LGBTQ issues and representation.
